definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: put away, exclude (NH Pi. (excommunicate) Hithp. Niph.; As.naduû, throw, overthrow, destroy, etc., Dl:HWB 448 f.);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[הַמְַנַדִּים לְיוֹם רַע]] Am 6:3 they that thrust off the evil day (i.e. refuse to think of it); lit. [[מְנַדֵּיכֶם]] Is 66:5 thrust away, exclude from association in worship (on usage v. Che).
